text: This is urgent. We can still change the ending. We know even ppl who mistrust our system (understandably) say they trust their own drs. #MedTwitter, call your Black pts. Talk about the #COVID19 #vaccine, w/ or w/o any appt. I’m starting this wk for every Black pt I’ve seen in 2y. https://t.co/7EpxSerqDo
